punchi chandayesunil daya alwissthirasara aarthika prathipaththiyak saha dawantha sanwardhana wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka karana aanduwa me 23 wanida pawathwena palath palana chanda wimasime di aayathana 65 ma wishishta lesa jayaganna bawa widuli sandesha ha thorathuru thakshana amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya kiyayi.mahinda chinthanaya yatathe muluratama ekama aramuneka pihita katayuthu karamin idiri gamanaka yedena mohothaka itha pahadili lesama me chanda wimasimedi ema palathwala janathawa da rajaya samanga sitimin rajaye jayagrahanaya thahawuru karanawata sakayak nathayi da amathiwaraya kiya.
